name: Flourishu00ae Thickening Styling Treatment for Thinning Hair
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Styling Products
about: What it is:u00a0A treatment that quickly plumps every individual strand for thickness, body, and all-day volume that accumulates with each use...Hair Texture: Straight and Wavy..Hair Type: Fine and Medium..Hair Concerns:- Hold & Style Extending.- Thinning.- Volumizing..Key Benefits:u00a0- Plumps, volumizes, and protects hair..Highlighted Ingredients:- Alpha Keratin 60ku CLINICALu00ae: Is a 100 percent bio-identical protein that repaves damaged areas of the cuticle..- Specialty Tremella (Mushroom): Weightlessly plumps and hydrates..- Honokiol (Magnolia Bark Extract): Preserves hairu2019s elasticity and structure...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also gluten-free, and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: Experience sustained body and fullness with Flourish Thickening Styling Treatment, your daily leave-in solution to thicken, volumize, hydrate, and care for all types of fine or thinning hair. This powdery, soufflu00e9-like cream is packed with densifying ingredients to deliver long-lasting volume, body, and bounce, as well as heat protection up to 450u00b0F...Fragrance Description:u00a0A gentle, spa-like blend of aromatic herbs, bright citrus, clean flowers, and balancing woods, the fragrance unfolds with basil and patchouli essential oils, which care for your scalp and hair...Clinical Results: In a clinical instrumentation study, results showed:.- Immediately increased volume.- All-day, sustained volume.- Up to 450u00b0F heat protection..In a consumer-perception study of 50 women, after 2 weeks of use:.- 88% said hair had all-day body.- Hair looked fuller and plumper and felt thicker and stronger with continued use
ingredients: -Alpha Keratin 60ku CLINICALu00ae: Is a 100 percent bio-identical protein that repaves damaged areas of the cuticle..-Specialty Tremella (Mushroom): Weightlessly plumps and hydrates..-Honokiol (Magnolia Bark Extract): Preserves hairu2019s elasticity and structure...Aqua (Water, Eau), Isoamyl Laurate, Propanediol, Polyimide-1, Squalane, Keratin, Tremella Fuciformis Polysaccharide, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-3, Trifolium Pratense (Clover) Flower Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Larix Europaea Wood Extract, Saccharomyces Cerevisiae Extract, Panthenol, Sodium Polyacrylate Starch, Caesalpinia Spinosa Fruit Extract, Magnolia Officinalis Bark Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Sprout Extract, Brassica Campestris/Aleurites Fordi Oil Copolymer, Tocopherol, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Seed Protein, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein, Galactoarabinan, Salvia Hispanica Seed Extract, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Extract, Hydrolyzed Corn Starch, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Powder, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Raphanus Sativus (Radish) Seed Extract, Octyldodecyl Oleate, Sodium Dilauramidoglutamide Lysine, Dextran, Pectin, Sorbitan Isostearate, Caprylyl Glycol, Glycine, Maltodextrin, Trehalose, Xylitol, Cellulose, Glycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Gluconolactone, Sodium Metabisulfite, Carbomer, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Zinc Chloride, Calcium Gluconate, Quaternium-95, Butylene Glycol, Octyldodecanol, Sodium Phosphate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phytic Acid, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Parfum (Fragrance), Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Phytate, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Hydroxide, Benzyl Alcohol, Isoeugenol, Citric Acid, Linalool, Limonene, Benzyl Benzoate, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Citral, Citronellol.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Dispense a nickel-size amount into hands, rub together, and apply from roots to ends of damp or dry hair. .-Style as desired...Styling tip:.-If you blow-dry after application, always use cool-to-medium heat. High temperatures are particularly harsh on fragile new hairs that donu2019t yet have a strong cuticle. Plus, cooler air helps lift from the roots to create the appearance of fullness and volume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have long, fine hair, and this product turned it into a sticky, tangly mess! My hair type is 2a, and past my shoulder blades.  I used the recommended nickel-sized amount and then blew it dry.  I got a little bit of volume, not a ton, but then the next morning my hair was clumping together and wouldn't lie smooth no matter how many times I brushed it.  Usually I can get 3-4 days out of a blow-out, but not this time.  Maybe this is great for people with other, thicker hair textures, but for me this was a fail.  Also, very strongly-perfumed, so beware.  Not a bad scent (herbal), just strong enough to compete with any other scent you might wanna wear. I'll be sticking with Color Wow Xtra Large Bombshell, which does the job much better without any clumpiness or scent!

reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using the Virtue Flourish Thickening Styling Treatment for a few weeks now, and I am thoroughly impressed with the results. As someone who is always on the lookout for products that can add volume and thickness to my hair without weighing it down, this treatment has been a game-changer.  First and foremost, the consistency of the product is perfect. Itu2019s lightweight and doesnu2019t leave any sticky residue, which is a huge plus for me. I apply it to damp hair, focusing on the roots, and then style as usual. The difference is noticeable almost immediately. My hair looks and feels fuller, with a natural lift that lasts all day.  One of the standout features of this treatment is its ability to nourish and strengthen hair while providing volume. My hair feels healthier and more resilient since I started using it, which I attribute to the high-quality ingredients Virtue is known for. The scent is also lovely u2013 fresh and clean, but not overpowering.  I also appreciate that this product doesnu2019t leave my hair feeling stiff or crunchy, which is a common issue with other thickening treatments Iu2019ve tried. Instead, my hair remains soft, touchable, and full of movement.  Overall, the Virtue Flourish Thickening Styling Treatment has exceeded my expectations. Itu2019s a fantastic addition to my hair care routine, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking to add volume and thickness to their hair while keeping it healthy and manageable.
